main event: A group of civilians in Singapore observed a strange object in the sky that appeared to stream a trail of smoke on 20 July 1952.
interesting points: Hundreds of citizens witnessed the object in the sky., The object was described as resembling a white plane., Witnesses reported a streak of smoke in an otherwise clear sky., One witness claimed the object lasted about fifteen seconds before plunging downward at high speed., This sighting was noted as the second occurrence of a strange object in the area within a few days.
sighted object: a strange object resembling a white plane streaming a trail of smoke
